sentence: “We want to stop the Biden administration from rescinding Title 42 because it may be one of the most boneheaded decisions of this administration, and they have done a lot of dumb things,” Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich told Fox News on Monday.
title: NEWS ALERT: Three GOP states sue over end of Title 42

sentence: “The U.S. Department of Homeland Security, (DHS), estimates getting rid of Title 42 will result in as many as 18,000 migrants per day—which could mean 540,000 migrants in a single month.” — Daily Caller (@DailyCaller) April 1, 2022 Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, the only border state official of the group, said his state will be at the forefront of the consequences of the decision.
author: Jennie Taer
title: 3 States Sue Biden Administration Over Ending COVID-19 Restrictions at Border

sentence: Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, Louisiana Attorney General Jeff Landry, and Missouri Attorney General Eric Schmitt have filed a lawsuit against President Joe Biden’s administration for plans to end the Title 42 border control that has helped stem waves of illegal immigration since 2020.
author: John Binder
title: Arizona, Louisiana, Missouri Sue Biden for Ending Title 42 Border Control

sentence: “The Title 42 Revocation thus stands as a radical outlier — seemingly the only COVID-19-based restriction the Administration sees fit to end,” said Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, Louisiana Attorney General Jeff Landry and Missouri Attorney General Eric S. Schmitt.
author: Stephen Dinan
title: States sue to halt Biden from ending border order stopping illegal immigrants

sentence: Earlier on Fox News, Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich - who joined Schmitt and Louisiana Attorney General Jeffrey Landry in the suit – called Biden's decision "boneheaded."
title: State official suing over rescission of Title 42 border policy says Biden is helping cartels

sentence: “We want to stop the Biden administration from rescinding Title 42 because it may be one of the most boneheaded decisions of this administration, and they have done a lot of dumb things,” Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich bluntly stated on “Fox & Friends” Monday.
author: Terresa Monroe-Hamilton
title: GOP states sue Biden admin over plan to rescind Title 42 border policy, likely open migrant floodgates

sentence: DeSantis’ sentiments have been felt by many as Missouri Attorney General Eric Schmitt, Arizona Attorney General Mark Brnovich, and Louisiana Attorney General Jeff Landry filed a lawsuit against Biden following the CDC’s announcement.
author: Laura Ramirez
title: DeSantis slams Biden’s revocation of Title 42: ‘This is a dereliction of duty!’
